title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official CLI and library for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a built-in model registry and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, generate embeddings, pull/list models, and stream responses with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (chat history, multi-model convos, file uploads, RAG).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builder-style API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for chatting and generating embeddings with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and model preload lists.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) with multi-arch support and docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function calling, fine-tune adapters, and edge deployments.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for macOS/Windows/Linux to chat with local models offline.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and moderation.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to plug local LLMs into no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds a /ollama slash command to query local models privately.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted note writing using any Ollama model offline.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Community Elixir client with GenServer behaviour for streaming chats and embeddings.
